resources.string: Welcome to Rotation Control. Use the checkbox below to send a notification widget that will help you turn on or off the rotation control.

"Welcome to Rotation Control.
By checking the checkbox below, it will place a notification icon in your notification bar.
Subsequently, rotation lock can be enabled or disabled by pulling down notification bar and clicking on the icon.
Unchecking will remove the notification icon."
